Package com.here.mobility.sdk.core.log

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiskBufferLogger
    A Logger which writes the log events to the disk, before uploading them to the server.
    LocalBufferLogger
    A Logger that writes into a given LogEventDiskBuffer.
    LogcatLogger
    A Logger that redirects to Android's Log.
    LogEventDiskBuffer
    A buffer of LogEvent stored on disk, before getting uploaded to the server.
    LogEventDiskBuffer.Metadata
    The logs metadata.
    LogEventsUploader
    Responsible for uploading the log events to the server.
    Logs
    The facade of the logging system.
    Logs.Tagged
    A more convenient interface for logging, which allows passing the tag once, in the constructor, instead of in every call.
    Logs.TaggedAndScoped
    An interface for logging which takes the logging tag and "internal"-ness of the messages in the constructor.
    LogsActivity
    An activity that displays the SDK logs.
    LogsClient
    The GrpcClient for uploading logs to the server.
    LogService
    Receives log requests from another process and stores them to disk.
    LogServiceLogger
    A Logger that asks LogService to log events.
